homeInfo.title: Hold Your Valuables with Luxury Archive NFT/Luxury Archive series valuables NFT
homeInfo.subtitle: Deposit Safely, Trade Freely

path.title: How to run
path.text3: Store owned luxury goods to the custodian, receive the NFT from the custodian.
path.text4: Holding the NFT means you have the ownership of the real goods. NFT holder can sell the NFT on VMM platform.
path.text5: Deposit crypto currency to your VMM account, preparing to trade NFTs representing ownership of the real goods.
path.text7: The price of NFT is fluctuating based on the market price of the real goods. NFTs can be traded freely between VMM users.
path.text8: The user wants to get the physical goods can visit the custodian and redeem it with the NFT. (If the NFT includes Exercise Price, it has to be paid to redeem)

selfAction.title: Link the virtuality to reality, trade more freely than physically.
selfAction.buyBody: Own it when you will, buy it when you are happy.
selfAction.collectBody: NFT doesn't stand for nothingness, as a matter of fact, it shall be represnting the true value.
selfAction.createBody: The physical merchandise and the NFT representting it is under good care of professional appraiser and systematic management.
selfAction.sellBody: You can trade freely by auction, fixed price. No more difficult on trading valuables.

purchaseNotes.title: Purchase Notes
purchaseNotes.text1: The price of the NFT does not include the amount of Loan.
purchaseNotes.text2: Ex. If you get a NFT cost US$2,000 representing physical good values US$10,000, with US$8,000 Loan out,
purchaseNotes.text3: you can get the physical good from the Custodian, by paying the Exercise Price(Loan Principal+Interest) displayed in the information of NFT.
purchaseNotes.text4: Purchasing the NFT priced US$2,000, means you got the ownership of the good values US$10,000.
purchaseNotes.text5: And you can also make profit by selling it in higher price.

infoHint.0: The amount paid to custodian when the NFT holder redeem the physical product.
infoHint.1:
Exercise Price = Loan Principal + Unpaid Interest
Unpaid Interest = Custody Duration / 365 * Annual Rate - Paid Interest
infoHint.2: The principal amount of the first owner received when depositing the physical product to the custodian.
infoHint.3: The annual interest rate charged by the custodian.
infoHint.5: The ownership represented by NFT disapears if not exercised(redeem physical product from the custodian) until the maturity. You can extend the maturity by clicking Extension.

recordType.32: System adds to the swap pool

about.text: The Luxury Archive Series of VMM platform is NFTs representing the ownership of physical property deposited in the professional custodian institution.

professional.title: Reliable Professionalism
professional.text: The safe of Luxury Archive is operated by Luxury Finance Inc., who is subsidiary of Korea biggest luxury commerce platform having 19 years’ experience in the industry. Every merchandise of the company is authenticated by professional appraisers. The company is a Pawn Bank providing custody and loan service to banks, pawnshops and individuals, based on the capability of authentication and evaluation.

safe.title: Safe Custody of Physical Valuables
safe.text1: Physical valuables of customers are kept in the vault with multiple authentication system. Only the authorized person can access the vault via permission by the biometric access program. Every access record is linked with professional security company under real time monitoring.
safe.text2: Each valuables kept in the vault has its unique identify code, helping to verify detail information and location efficiently.
safe.text3: The safety of goods is the highest priority of the custodian. It will try its best to take care of customer’s property.

method.title: How to use Luxury Archive NFT
method.text1: The Luxury Archive NFT is issued to the owner of the property when the physical valuables deposited to the vault. The owner can trade the NFT on VMM platform freely, and the holder who’ve bought the NFT becomes the next only owner of the property.
method.text2: The Luxury Archive NFT is the only proof of the ownership of the property under custody. The holder of NFT can visit the custodian at will to redeem the physical property by paying the exercise amount indicated in the NFT description.

pledges.textDialog: You can stake or unstake any amount (the same meaning as increasing or reducing staking amount). The amount in status of "in progress of unstaking" is not counted to dividend. The canceled portion can be participated in next round dividend. The dividend is not transferred to users account automatically, it shall be received by users manually.
